field.label: Configurable
field.comment:
Type:
- Mapping: Declare each PIM common attributes you want to be mapped with another Adobe Commerce/Magento attribute. Fill the value field with the corresponding Adobe Commerce/Magento attribute. Example: Attribute = name_product_model and Value = name
- First Variation value: Declare each PIM variation specific attributes you want to be imported in Adobe Commerce/Magento configurable products. The value of the first variation associated to the product model will be inserted in the corresponding Adobe Commerce/Magento configurable product attribute. Leave the value field empty.
- SQL Statement: Use a SQL statement in the value field for custom value assignation from Akeneo Connector temporary tables. Example: Attribute = url_key and Value = LOWER(url_key)
- Default value: Fill the value field to assign a constant default value for a given attribute. Example: Attribute = enabled and Value = 0
